english.segment1: You're close, very close. But Lord I miss you. Here's where I find hope. You're coming soon. And I long so much to see You-that I cry. Everywhere are the signs that the end is near. I say
english.segment2: Come quickly, Lord. When the sun grows dark. And the moon will shine no more. Quickly Lord. When the stars fall out of the sky above. Won't you come, dear Lord
english.segment3: Be ready-is what I want to be. When You come for me. No sitting on my hands. I won't be caught sleeping. And I long so much to see you. That I reach for the sky. And I lift up my hands/. And I hold them high..high
english.segment4: Come quickly, Lord. When the sun grows dark. And the moon will shine no more. Quickly Lord. When the stars fall out of the sky above. Won't you come, dear Lord. Come dear Lord, dear Lord
english.segment5: Come quickly Lord Jesus-please come for me. Come quickly Lord Jesus-please come for me
english.segment6: Come take us away to be with You/. Come take us away
english.segment7: Come quickly, Lord. When the sun grows dark. And the moon will shine no more. Quickly Lord. When the stars fall out of the say above. (repeat)
english.segment8: Come take us away to be with You/. Come take us away (2X).
